Uses of Class
com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.CarrotMojo

  • Packages that use CarrotMojo 
    Package Description
    com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.cfn  
    com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.dns

    • Uses of CarrotMojo in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.cfn

      Subclasses of CarrotMojo in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.cfn 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CloudForm
      base for cloud formation goals
      class  CloudFormCreateStack
      cloud formation: create stack based on: stack name, stack template (CloudFormCreateStack.stackTemplateFile), stack parameters (CloudFormCreateStack.stackPropertiesInputFile + CloudFormCreateStack.stackInputParams), and produce a stack output (CloudFormCreateStack.stackPropertiesOutputFile) as well as inject output into into project.properties ; wait for completion or fail (CloudForm.stackTimeout);
      class  CloudFormDeleteStack
      cloud formation: delete stack based on: stack name; ; wait for completion or fail (CloudForm.stackTimeout)
      class  CloudFormFindStack
      cloud formation: find stack by name
      class  CloudFormUpdateStack
      cloud formation: update stack based on: stack name ; wait for completion or fail (CloudForm.stackTimeout)

    • Uses of CarrotMojo in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.dns

      Subclasses of CarrotMojo in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.dns 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NameServ
      base for route 53 dns goals
      class  NameServEnsureCNAME
      route53: ensure cname record
      class  NameServFindZone
      route53: find dns zone name from dns host name
      class  NameServListZone
      route53: list dns zone entires

    • Uses of CarrotMojo in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.ecc

      Subclasses of CarrotMojo in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.ecc 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ElastiComp
      base for elastic compute goals
      class  ElastiCompImageCreate
      create new ami image from existing AWS ElasticCompute instance
      class  ElastiCompImageDelete
      delete existing ami image with all ebs snapshots
      class  ElastiCompImageUnReg
      unregister existing ami image

    • Uses of CarrotMojo in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.grv

      Subclasses of CarrotMojo in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.grv 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GroovyBase
      base for groovy script goals
      class  GroovyExec
      groovy script executor; has access to MavenProject;

    • Uses of CarrotMojo in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.ssh

      Subclasses of CarrotMojo in com.carrotgarden.maven.aws.ssh 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SecureShell
      base for ssh goals
      class  SecureShellExecute
      execute remote ssh commands
      class  SecureShellPublish
      publish directory content via sftp from local to remote system
      class  SecureShellRetrieve
      retrieve directory content via sftp from remote to local system
